content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position 10.5, 10.5), boiler(position -6.0, 24.5) and offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(43.0, -84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position 43.0, -84.0) and a furnace at position(40.0, -82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position -15.0, -50.0) and a furnace at position(45.0, -83.0)
-  Furnace at position(42.0, -81.0)
-  Furnace at position(45.0, -80.0)
-  Furnace at position(40.0, -79.0)

### Iron plate storage at position(43.5, -82.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Chest at position(43.5, -82.5) with inventory {'coal': 71}
-  Chest at position(40.5, -80.5) with empty inventory
-  Chest at position(43.5, -81.5) with empty inventory
-  Chest at position(-16.5, -49.5) with inventory {'iron-ore': 115}
-  Chest at position(2.5, 0.5) with empty inventory
-  Chest at position(0.5, 2.5) with empty inventory

### Lab at position unknown
Consists of lab with input {'automation-science-pack': 100} and status EntityStatus.NO_POWER

### Inserter system at position(3.5, 0.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner inserter at position(3.5, 0.5) with fuel {'coal': 45}
-  Burner inserter at position(0.5, 3.5) with fuel {'coal': 42}

### Pipe system at position(11.5, 7.5)
Consists of pipe group with fluid system 100519 and pipes [(x=11.5,y=7.5),(x=10.5,y=7.5),(x=12.5,y=7.5),...,(x=-4.5,y=24.5),(x=-3.5,y=24.5),(x=-2.5,y=24.5)]

### Pipe system at position(-9.5, 23.5)
Consists of pipe group with fluid system 100526, fluid water and pipes [(x=-9.5,y=23.5),(x=-8.5,y=23.5),(x=-8.5,y=22.5),(x=-7.5,y=22.5),(x=-6.5,y=22.5)]

### Electricity distribution system
Consists of electricity group with id 64475, poles [(x=0.5,y=10.5),(x=2.5,y=1.5),(x=4.5,y=5.5),...,(x=-3.5,y=18.5),(x=-3.5,y=22.5),(x=8.5,y=9.5)] and voltage 0

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when burner mining drills are out of fuel
-  Ensure that the burner mining drills have a sufficient fuel supply before starting the mining process
-  Monitor the fuel levels of the burner mining drills and replenish them as needed

### Errors when furnaces have no ingredients to smelt
-  Ensure that the furnaces have a sufficient supply of ingredients to smelt before starting the smelting process
-  Monitor the ingredient levels of the furnaces and replenish them as needed

### Errors when boilers are out of fuel
-  Ensure that the boilers have a sufficient fuel supply before starting the boiling process
-  Monitor the fuel levels of the boilers and replenish them as needed

### Errors when generators have no input liquid
-  Ensure that the generators have a sufficient supply of input liquid before starting the generation process
-  Monitor the input liquid levels of the generators and replenish them as needed

### Errors when labs have no power
-  Ensure that the labs have a sufficient power supply before starting the research process
-  Monitor the power levels of the labs and replenish them as needed
